reviewText:
I wanted to complete my Sandra Bullock Movie Collection. This was the one i did not have yet. Now I do !
I bought this movie for the immensely beautiful woman Sandra Bullock. I found all her movies treasures, even the early B-movies in which she appeared. And can recommend everyone to buy this movie.
I cannot play this disc because it is fragmented and will not play.  I will never purchase a disc from Amazon again.. You have no recourse once you try to play it and it does not work.
